<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Book Your Hotel">ac915fb987703010d05eeb173cbb3568</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:821e8ff587703010d05eeb173cbb3568</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set Urgency as High</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
   if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
      return;
   }
var vipalert = g_form.getReference('hotel_booking_for',vipfunction);
	function vipfunction(vipalert){
		if(vipalert.vip=='true'){
			g_form.setValue('urgancy','1');
			alert("The Client is a VIP member.Urgency is set to High");
		}
			
		
	}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-18 08:04:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2d9113f987703010d05eeb173cbb35d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Urgency as High</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Client Hotel Booking Application" source="x_563615_client_ho">4caa4bfc87d03010d05eeb173cbb3583</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Client Hotel Booking Application">4caa4bfc87d03010d05eeb173cbb3583</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2d9113f987703010d05eeb173cbb35d3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-18 08:04:03</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
